title: Fury sparks brawl with Strowman before being separated by entire WWE locker room
text:
Tyson Fury has had his first taste of WWE action after taking his feud with Braun Strowman to the next level by sparking a mass brawl on Monday Night RAW.

Fury first came to blows with the American wrestler on Smackdown last week, before being escorted from the building by security.

But the Gypsy King was back on Monday, invited as a guest on Monday Night RAW, where he demanded an apology from Strowman for being disrespected.

Tyson Fury squares up with WWE wrestler Braun Strowman as their feud comes to a head

Fury had to be held back by other members of the WWE locker-room as things got out of hand

After being introduced to the US crowd, he said: 'Last week I was here minding my own business, Braun tried to make me look like a fool. I wound up getting chucked out, so tonight I'm here to demand an apology.'

Strowman then entered the ring and hit back: 'Look man, I was messing around and trying to have a little fun with you last Friday on Smackdown. That is, until I saw the way you looked at me like you wanted a piece of this.

'I don't know if you heard, but when security was dragging your a*** out of the building I was shouting "let him go" because I promise you, the last thing you want is to get in my ring. You have no idea what I'm capable of. I will literally eat you for lunch.'

After some more verbal sparring, things turned physical as Strowman lifted Fury into the corner before security burst into the ring to break the pair up.

Fury enjoyed his first taste of WWE on Monday Night RAW in Bakersfield, California this week

The pair fought numerous times after breaking away from security and the other wrestlers

The Gypsy King took his anger out on security by throwing 'punches' in order to break free

Fury then dramatically threw off nine men to jump at his rival again, throwing 'punches' at each of them, before the entire WWE locker-room emptied out to jump into the ring and calm things down.

Again, Strowman and Fury repeatedly broke away from their restraints to kick things off again, with the Englishman eventually ending up topless and screaming for a fight.

With both men standing at an impressive 6"8, it was a battle not many would have dared to get between.
description: Tyson Fury has had his first taste of WWE action after taking his feud with Braun Strowman to the next level by sparking a mass brawl on Monday Night RAW.
